headline: What adidas (XTRA:ADS)'s Rare Bank of America Sell Rating Says About Its Competitive Moat
summary: In early January 2026, Bank of America issued a rare sell rating on adidas, citing slowing growth and intensifying competition from brands such as Nike, On, Asics, and Puma. The downgrade underscores how shifting casualwear trends and a crowded performance footwear market are testing adidas’ ability to defend its brand position. Next, we’ll examine how Bank of America’s concerns about mounting competition could influence adidas’ existing investment narrative and outlook. Outshine the giants:...

headline: Bryce Harper May Be Parting Ways With Under Armour
summary: The Phillies player was seen wearing Nike sneakers and said he was a “free agent” for apparel and footwear right now.
